features: 【COMPATIBLE】This Dodge Ram Window Switch compatible for 2002 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010 Dodge Ram 1500 2500 3500, Durango, Dakota, Sprinter models including Dodge Ram 1500 Quad Cab 2003, 2004, 2005, Dodge Ram 2500 Quad Cab 2004, 2005, 2003 Dodge Ram 3500, 2001 Dodge Durango, 2002 Dodge Dakota Quad Cab, Please see the detail description to know more models.
【FUNCTION】Mirror Adjust, Door & Window Lock, Auto Down Control. Perfectly replace the left or driver side window master switch on Your Vehicle.
【EASY INSTALLATION】Quick and simple installation. Just need to remove your original master power window control switch and install. Plug and Play.
【Service】Please carefully check your vehicle model before purchase. If you have any problems with the power window switch, simply contact us anytime!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The power window switch is located on the front left driver's side door panel and used to control the movement of car's power windows and door lock. Our window switch undergo strict testing to ensure that they operate smoothly and effectively, providing reliable window control for years to come.

Compatible with the following vehicles: For Dodge 2001 2002 2003 Dodge Durango For Dodge 2001 2002 2003 2004 Dodge Dakota Quad Cab For Dodge 2006 2007 2008 Dodge Ram 1500 Truck Mega Cab For Dodge 2002 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 Dodge Ram 1500 Truck Quad Cab For Dodge 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 Dodge Ram 2500 Truck Quad Cab For Dodge 2006 2007 2008 2009 Dodge Ram 2500 Truck Mega Cab For Dodge 2006 2007 2008 2009 Dodge Ram 3500 Truck Mega Cab For Dodge 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 Dodge Ram 3500 Truck Quad Cab For Dodge 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 Dodge Sprinter 2500 For Dodge 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 Dodge Sprinter 3500

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Switch installed in a 2007 Dodge 1500 Mega Cab. Fit was perfect and works better than the OEM switch. The buttons on this switch are raised a little more and it makes it easier to use than the OEM. Awesome Price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was so easy to install and worked like a charm
reviews.reviewText: Used it on an older model dodge ram. The windows world not roll up or down on passenger side and the two back windows. They are are working perfectly now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Perfectly! Works Great!
reviews.reviewText: My driver side window stopped going all the way down automatically. Replacing the Master Switch resolved the problem! Hopefully, it will last as long as the original (20 years).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cost of the replacement switch.
reviews.reviewText: Liked the image posted, it allowed me to actually measure and insure that the replacement would fit. The price was very good as similar items for OE replacement were much more costly. Not sure of the warrenty time frame on this item. It did fit and function on installation day. Need more info on the supplier as I would reccomend them to my friends. I am trusting that this replacement will hold up and last in my truck. Thank You, OLB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This master driver side window control sends the power to passenger window control.
reviews.reviewText: This master window and door lock control switch supplies power to the passenger controls. Fixed the problem with my passenger window control not operating. Well built new master control at a very good price. Thanks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This came quickly and was simple to install. Work great. Solved the problem I had and saved me money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement 2003 dodge 1500
reviews.reviewText: All windows work again, great product at great price
Works great for the windows/ old one had been intermittent for a few years after getting wet multiple times.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality and buttons feels clicky
reviews.reviewText: Good quality replacement for the original. Easy to install and works instantly, the buttons all feel great and fit is accurate. Hoping this will outlast the truck.
Good product works well, easy to install, function is better than OEM.
